credit_line: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
title: Design for carriage understructure
medium: Pen and black ink, traces of graphite, brush and wash, on white laid paper
description: Profile of the beam us shown beside the elevation of the understructure which is decorated with a beaded oval at center within a shield, garlands at top and bottom, volutes at either side. At top, scale: 2 pied. Framing lines.
name: drawing
